text: Tjark de Vries (born 17 July 1965) is a Dutch rower. He competed in the men's coxless four event at the 1988 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:Dutch male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of the Netherlands Category:Rowers at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:People from Waddinxveen
title: Tjark de Vries
